title: Community Beta Maintenance - Wednesday, May 28th
body:
Good morning,

We'll be bringing the Community beta boards offline at 11:00am PST for maintenance. We anticipate the boards being offline for approximately an hour, but that time frame could change if problems are encountered.

While the service is offline, please feel free to join us, and your fellow players in the [PVP.net chatroom](http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/WKLwibce-communityplatform-channel-on-pvpnet). 

Thanks in advance for your patience.

replies.body: This maintenance has been completed. Welcome back!
I was just about to Riot.
so thats why the iBlitzcrank appeared.
